str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Carefully, exactly, strictly, distinctly. Adverb from the same as akribestatos; exactly.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural

str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular

str2: Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
A thief. From klepto; a stealer.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The night, night-time. A primary word; 'night'.
